mapper.select: SELECT review.review_no, review.user_no, users.name, review.title, review.content, review.rating, review.create_date, review.update_date, review.when, review.with_whom FROM review JOIN users ON review.user_no = users.user_no ORDER BY review.create_date DESC
select review.*, users.name, users.profile from review join users on review.user_no = users.user_no where review.review_no = #{reviewNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_review.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO review (review_no, user_no, title, content, rating, create_date, update_date, when, with_whom) VALUES (#{reviewNo}, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rating}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{when}, #{withWhom})
